data.message: I've enjoyed Facebook and messenger for years. But it would be nice to have a option to where I can be on without others knowing I'm there. Can't tell you how many issues this causes.

replies.message: Hey there, Jason. Have you tried following these steps to turn your chat on and off? Learn more: http://bit.ly/2blmPto. -Jordan
I'll give it a try. Will it come on automatically if I use messenger? Or do I have to turn it back on? That little green active light is a real pain in my a#%!!!

I turned mine off on my phone..but it still says Im online..and I do not have it on at home either on my laptop? Not sure why that is happening? Also I have not had a "ticker'" in almost a year. I have tried all the suggestions and still nothing changes.
